document_data.name: Asberyth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Asberyth''' was the seat of government in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]]. All city government offices operated out of this building, and monthly Council sessions were held here.
document_data.Location: The Asberyth was located in the east central section of Melvaunt.
document_data.Defenses: The government building was protected by 24 city guards at all times.
